puzzle.title: Drink Specials
puzzle.hint: Each of these drinks has a location (e.g., a city) as part of its name.

The drink names, in alphabetical order, are:
- Dublin Doubler - London Buck - Lynchburg Lemonade - Manhattan - Moscow Mule - Portland Coffee - Southampton Slam - Tokyo Rose - Washington Apple
Not sure what to do with those numbers in parentheses? Look up the "Indexing" method in our Puzzling Basics guide!
The solution is: on the heart of gold
